website_summaries.verdict: Don't let the unfamiliar name stop you if you are looking for a smart lightstrip, because this model provides intuitive capabilities for a very reasonable price.
pros: Lightstrip offers smart capabilities and is compatible with iOS and Android devices via the Govee app
Easy to set up, low price
cons: Lightstrip adhesive doesn't stick very well on some surfaces
Occasionally drops WiFi connectivity during use

customer_reviews.title: The Real Story
customer_reviews.text: This item works as advertised but the real story about this purchase is the customer service I received. Outstanding reply to a small problem! I hooked these up to my EchoDot and it worked fine, dim, change color etc. Except, when I told Alexa to make them white she replied with OK but they didn't change. Contacted customer support, they found the glitch in one day, posted an update within two days and the problem was fixed. So nice to see a company care about their product with such enthusiasm!!!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Lorenz

customer_reviews.title: Smart lights for the right price.
customer_reviews.text: Great lights for background color. These lights work with Alexa so I have setup a group named background and I just have to instruct Alexa to set background to any desired color.
customer_reviews.author: J-R

customer_reviews.title: Works great for a fraction of the price
customer_reviews.text: I'm turning my house into a smart home, and of course LED back lighting on a TV is a must. Originally I was going to go with Philip's hue, but after a lot of research I stumbled upon these. My biggest concern was price. I would have needed 2 sets of the Philip's hue to do my 65in TV. At $80 a pop, that's $160! So, these were 1/4 the price. My other main concern was Compatibility with my other smart devices. 10/10 again for Compatibility. Had it synced and connected to my google home in less than 2 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Lee Hafer

customer_reviews.title: Love the tech on these lights!
customer_reviews.text: I love these light strips! I just got them in today. I immediately installed them on the back of my 55” Samsung flatscreen. Installation was easy. The 3M backing really stuck well, and time will tell how long they stay on. Hopefully a really long time! Once installed, I turned the lights on, and paired with my home WiFi. You download The ap, create an account, and then pair your device. I also went to my Alexa ap and enables the Alexa skill for the Govee, and it works perfect. I tested out the music mode and several other modes, adjusted brightness up and down, and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Easy application and cut to fit
customer_reviews.text: Just an awesome product. Took 5 minutes with my TV on the wall to Mount these lights. The app controls it with a phone. Too easy and too cool.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Magill

customer_reviews.title: loved!
customer_reviews.text: i loved this product, it was super easy to install!
customer_reviews.author: maria jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Great lights with WIFI for the money
customer_reviews.text: These strip lights are great. I wanted them for above cabinet lighting. They were easy to set up and most important for me is that they go to last setting when power is applied to controller/strip. My only real issue with them is I can't seem to get them to go to pure white. I use pixels for Christmas displays and these go to a very clean white. The preset white on these strips has a blue tint to them. The seller for these is very good with any issues and responds in a timely manner. I would definitely buy these again especially thru the same vendor.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: You can cut and add connectors
customer_reviews.text: Fixed my sons room up and added these led lights. Uploaded the app but it doesn’t work with all the strips. We had to cut it and use connectors. They do work but with app it only works with one strip. Maybe we did something wrong. He likes it though to use with the buttons on cord.
customer_reviews.author: lilsusieb

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE!!!
customer_reviews.text: The tape didn’t stick and don’t listen to the reviews they must work for the company: You Can not Cut these and use in multiple areas like other companies because it doesn’t come with connectors, The Adhesion is horrible and you can’t reach the company; If So You’ll Be Holding For A Hour Maybe more but that’s all I could tolerate. SUCH A RIP OF BUT GREAT COLORS! I’m disappointed but also pissed because I wanted it to work so bad
customer_reviews.author: Lalayah Carter

customer_reviews.title: GET the HUE brand don't waste your money on off brands
customer_reviews.text: This was suppose to work with alexa etc. but it is a completely different app than my normal group of lights. I use Philips hue mainly. I wanted to get the Hue light strip to use with an app to change the colors based on what is on the TV. Well all my other lights change but the main lights behind the TV.. ( the off brand here) are not even recognized and do not work. Half are burnt out or don't work. I should have just bought the Hue brand instead of trying to be cheap and cut corners.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not dreamcolor  and I feel tricked for buying them
customer_reviews.text: I Feel like I was scammed. The picture was of the dreamcolor strips (the strips that can do multiple colors) however what arrived was the plain RGB strips. I shouldn’t have been surprised as the link was for an on sale now click here to buy. Since they are usually around thirty for the dream color and these were listed as around 20, which is the usually Price for just the rgb version. So they weren’t on sale, they weren’t dreamcolor, and they were just normal priced single color strips with the dream color picture fake marked as on sale to trick people into buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Erbutole

customer_reviews.title: THE. BEST. LED. LIGHTS!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Now my workstation looks good! I would get one for my room. The app is responsive and can setup a time to turn on and a time to turn off. You can even set the colors you like.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: best lights ever
customer_reviews.text: these are very easy to use and the apps allows you you customize the colors and everything!!
customer_reviews.author: i have spending problems

customer_reviews.title: Hate it
customer_reviews.text: This thing refuses to stay connected to my WiFi and it’s at 2.4 ghz. Yes the app works but I can’t get Alexa to work with it because it constantly say it’s not responding. I’m so pissed
customer_reviews.author: Philip Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Not 32ft
customer_reviews.text: While the 16ft one was perfect for my needs, the 32ft one is extremely misleading. It is not 32ft, it is simply 2 16ft strips that do not connect together. If I hadnt already partially setup my kitchen prior to knowing this, I could have put the outlet in the middle and stretched the led in two different directions. Unfortunately I was not prepared for that because I had thought I had purchased a 32ft strip. Now I need to contact govee and see if I can get ahold of another splitter while wasting money on one more strip
customer_reviews.author: Squeezit

customer_reviews.title: Worked great at first
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about 2 weeks then lost connection with app and Google Home. Attempted all kinds of resets and troubleshooting. This thing will no longer connect 😔 worthless now.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew B

customer_reviews.title: Overall highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Really cool, lights can adjust brightness and you can set up your own color system with the app, and it’s true about the sound sensitivity. Setting up does take a little effort. My walls are crinkly/rigid, so I recommend using thumbtacks for the small plastic hangers. Overall it’s highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: layla perez

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and set up. I installed this under a large bathroom vanity and looks great. The sticky side adheres extremely well to the underside of the vanity. I read some comments that some people had problems getting it to stick but I cannot see how as it is very sticky and actually hard to remove if you apply it to a wrong area. The app works great and works well with Alexa after a little struggle getting Alexa to find it. Overall extremely happy with it and would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Laurence Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: The adhesive on it is pretty good and the control feels food quality. Overall a really good product and I love it. My apartment doesn't have lights so this can plug straight into the outlet and I can use the switch on it to turn it on and off. It brings and I'm glad for once that this led strip didn't have a bad led. I love it and I would definitely recommend buying again
customer_reviews.author: Killaj

customer_reviews.title: Probably gonna buy way too much of this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Put it along the inside of my bed frame and set alexa to turn it on automatically when my alarm goes off with the sunrise hue because I wake up before the sun comes up. Pretty freaking awesome
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Bottom line: This model is the best in the line
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the less expensive model and had to exchange for this one because my LG Smart TV remote interfered with the other set from day 1. Bottom line: I’m glad I did. The app works flawlessly with the lights. Of course it’s been mentioned that they’re very bright, but you can adjust the intensity level on this model. Additionally, they seemed to have a very strong adhesive that worked extremely well after having cleaned the back of my tv thoroughly with alcohol. I think they will be easy enough to remove if wanted, because of the way the adhesive is attached to the strips (it’s almost like double-sided tape).
customer_reviews.author: The Brain

customer_reviews.title: Very good and bright
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, it has the base regular colors but when you get the app you can customize what color you really want. Good lenth and the sticky stuff on the back holds really well. The support brakets it comes with hold well too. Very bright on the highest setting and very mellow on the lowest. I highly recommend these LEDs. My only complaint is that i wish i could have found a longer variation of the model i bought but its all good because if you can solder they have copper connection pads at the end of the stripe
customer_reviews.author: samuel

customer_reviews.title: Horrible for Connectivity or Smart Home Automated Usage, Not Stable, Not Alexa Friendly!
customer_reviews.text: Having lots of experience with smart home automation & devices, I have to conclude that this product is a Major FAIL! This product is not Alexa friendly & refuses to connect to the 2.4 GHz band on the WiFi ( it is also NOT compatible with the 5 GHz) Even the Bluetooth is a blunder & keeps becoming unresponsive! Had the bluetooth feature alone at least been “stable”, I probably would have kept them. ( simply because I Hate returning items & would have made do with it) Also these are NOT waterproof & have lousy adhesive... Not such a bargain after all. Actually they are way over priced for such a cheap & cheesy product!
customer_reviews.author: Tater

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to set up...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Put the lights on daughter's loft bed and she loves them. Easy to set up. App gives you a great deal of control. Allows us to turn them off without going in her room. Already ordered a 2nd set for younger daughter who is very jealous of how cool they look on big sister's bed 😊
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth L.

customer_reviews.title: Half of it stopped working after a couple of days
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately half of my strip cut out and stopped working (refer to images). I am usually satisfied with this brand but for the cost and the usual reliability of this brand and their strips, I have to say that I am extremely dissatisfied with this. Hopefully I can get this replaced with one that works. Other than that, it was way to attach and setup. But sad it doesn’t work to it’s capacity *UPDATE: Returning the defected one I have and getting a new one. Obviously and hopefully should do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Randall

customer_reviews.title: Best LED strip ever
customer_reviews.text: I bought these lights to backlight the new television that i just got for my bedroom. I had enough lights to also light my large hamster cage too. I love, love, love them. Being able to customize the colors to go with the theme i have in the hamster cage is the best part. The presets are cool too. Don’t hesitate to purchase them if you’re thinking about it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi B

customer_reviews.title: Amazing LED strips, easy install, very bright!
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing product! Hands down the best kit available right now and the price is amazing. Awesome adhesion, easy app, works flawlessly with Alexa. Im buying more!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable Value
customer_reviews.text: These lights are incredible!!! Very bright work with both alexa and Google home. Wanted to back light TV, Hue lights would have been $140+, Govee 19.99 + tax no brainer. App is easy to use connects seamlessly with Alexa and Google built in microphone senses music and changes colors creating a basic light show if you like ( included video). If you don’t use app there is a remote (included) and wired control box to set up and use. GREAT PRODUCT! Just ordered another set to do Bedroom TV and a 32’ set to do above kitchen cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: Justok55

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Nexillumi is what I ordered when I returned these. These are very difficult to sync and require ordering additional parts if you want to do so. The brand I switched to has a 50 foot package where they plug-in together and sync up so easily. These were a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Tara C.

customer_reviews.title: Probably exactly what you need
customer_reviews.text: This thing is perfect for what it is. Good adhesion and more than enough length to cover a big square behind my 65" Samsung Q70R. Good brightness behind the TV, even in the daytime (though obviously not going to light up a bright room). App is fairly easy to use with decent customization options. I just wish it worked with Apple Homekit, but it does not. Remembers last settings even if you just want to use the attached power button and not open the app every time. You will need the app though to get the lighting you want as the attached buttons are extremely limited. Would consider buying for other projects. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Bill E.

customer_reviews.title: No instructions and did not work
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the longer version (that requires connecting the two separate lines of lights) and could not find any instructions online or in the box given that were helpful. Instructions were overly simplified, did not identify key parts, and gave no clue as to how to assemble the two separate pieces (which we ended up doing incorrectly, but is now stuck to the wall and does not connect) and so the room intended to have lights is now only half way decorated. The lights will occasionally flicker in weird ways and often not respond to the app.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Product works!  Excellent integration with Alexa and good value.
customer_reviews.text: This product works as described. Voice integration with Amazon Alexa works very well for basic on/off, color selection, and dimming. The phone app provides full control of all features and provides a convenient way to manage and control the lights. The app also sets a schedule to control the timing of the lights. The only downside is the power supply that comes with the lights is not sufficient to energize the full 32 ft connected contiguously/serial. You must split the two 16ft lengths in parallel between the two power connectors. For my situation it would be better if the manufacturer provided a power supply that could light the entire 32 ft from one connection.
customer_reviews.author: L. Blaine

customer_reviews.title: piece of cake to setup
customer_reviews.text: works great, very easy to setup, took about 10 minutes to stick strips to my daugters window, connect it to the app and have it in sync with alexa. Would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: al

customer_reviews.title: Great set of lights, but only if you only need one set
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased for my daughter's room. She wanted them all around the edges of the ceiling. The lights are very easy to install and operate. My only complaints 1) there's no way to connect multiple sets together to extend them... You have to plug each set directly to a wall outlet and 2) we bought two sets to convert the whole circumference of the room and the brightness of the two sets is very very different so it looks odd. If I only needed one set, I would have given 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mike T

customer_reviews.title: Great product !!!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly! Combined with the milky aluminum diffusers looks awesome !!! Couldn't be happier how it came out.
customer_reviews.author: Dave T

customer_reviews.title: Close but no cigar.
customer_reviews.text: The lights are super easy to install and set up, but if I try to make them white half of them are green for some reason. Sinking them up to music is pretty cool, but the microphone built into the lights sucks. It's got to be pretty loud in order for them lights to react to the music. They're okay but I have other sets that work better. I want to be able to tell my Google home to turn the lights a certain color and they turn that color! These lights don't seem capable of doing that for certain colors which is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: If you cut it, you can't use the part you cut off
customer_reviews.text: The whole reason I bought this was so that I could have lighting on my desk as my keyboard doesn't have a backlight...after opening it up and reading it all I'm going to have to use the full 16.4 ft. in one stretch. Which means it'll be winding all over the place on my desk just to get to the areas that I want it. That's just disappointing. It should come with more than one connector so that when you cut it (which is a main part of the description, that it's DIY) the rest doesn't just go in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: C.R. Huntington

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 days, not 32 feet!
customer_reviews.text: Problem 1: I Ordered 32 feet, but instead its 2 16 feet strips without a connector between the 2 strips. I reached out to their support via email 3 times - NO RESPONSE. Problem 2: First night the 1 strip worked fine and connected to my Google Home. Second night half the strip was a different brightness than the other half of the same strip. The one half was the correct white while the other half was a greenish white. I noticed them some lights were red and not lighting correctly. So now Im tearing down and sending back. No response from Govee and cheap lights. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth S.

customer_reviews.title: Ok? I guess...
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving three stars simply because it mostly works as advertised. The lights are bright, it connected easily with my wifi and android phone. The app is responsive and works flawlessly 90% of the time, which is good. There, again, is no synchronization to music it flashes with the beat at random. If you plan to use for ambient lighting then this is not a bad choice. If you plan to use it for entertaining then I highly suggest you keep shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Works OK
customer_reviews.text: These were fairly simple to install and set up however there is one function that could not be achieved. I would have liked for the lights to automatically turn off at a preset time after giving the command to turn them on with Google Home. I had lengthy and detailed correspondence with this vendor about this situation. Unfortunately, this setting was not possible with these lights. I must use the manual switch to turn them off which I mounted on the side of the headboard so it isn't a big deal. Seller were nothing but cooperative and helpful. Other than that, these lights work very well and are much cheaper in price compared to the Philips Hue system.
customer_reviews.author: Willee

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding performance; great app supported by a caring company!
customer_reviews.text: I've had these lights for nearly 2 months now and they are perfect! They're very bright with vibrant colors. I must also mention how amazing the app is: it's so easy to pair the lights and I've never had a problem with them! The developers have done such a great job upgrading and maintaining the app. It's great to know that Govee cares about the user experience and reliability; I can rely on these to work consistently! It has a very simple and sleek UI, which really sets them apart from the others, given that alternative LED lights cost so much more. I really feel like you're getting a great value from these; couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: great price and they work for me using Alexa
customer_reviews.text: I found these lights work well they are a little less bright compaired to the phillips Hue, they are thinner than the hue's all most metal thick tape with lights on them the glue seems to work well however if you want to remove them after a few months I think you may rip them, not to say this couldn't be done. Great for highlighting I have included the Phillips and Govee Smart WiFi LED in a picture and video. I will buy more for the price. I used them for lighting a cutting board under a cabinet. with all of them it was just bright enough.
customer_reviews.author: sesh1860

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Accent Lighting Solution!
customer_reviews.text: These LEDs are the perfect smart-accent-lighting solution! The system came well packaged and with very clear instructions for setup. The light strips, wiring, and controller felt to be very high-quality. The light strips were easy to cut and adhere to my shelf project, and I was very pleased with how thin the strips were. They are basically paper-thin! The wiring was simple and the control module easily linked to the app on my phone and to my Echo Dot. I couldn’t ask for an easier installation and the end product is fantastic. The lights are bright and uniform and the various colors look great. Overall, I highly recommend these lights.
customer_reviews.author: Acanuck2

customer_reviews.title: Great quality strip lights—easily installed & controlled
customer_reviews.text: These lights are great! They are very easy to install, and the adhesion is great. It is very easy to firmly install, but still remove if needed without damage. I do not recommend adhering to a bare wall, as it could remove paint once the lights are taken down. The remote control is good, with enough options to customize them to your preference. The lights are very bright and colorful—they look great!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Not good... Barely had for just couple months and already having some bad LEDs. After couple weeks 1 led was fixed on red no matter what... Couple weeks later couple more LEDs fixed on red... So now the back of my TV is lit up purple like I want except for a few red spots which is highly distracting. Plus I don't like the fact you can't put the lights on a timer on the app.
customer_reviews.author: Kng

customer_reviews.title: Failure after three months, ****UPDATE*** Govee Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: *** UPDATE *** after contacting Govee Customer service about my issue, they sent out a new strip within two days! You don't see customer service like this very often. Thank you! Pros: very good app based control and hardware control of lights and hundreds of color options Cons: after having installed them for about three months, there are groups of three leds that have lost a color. Either yellow or blue seems to be the two I am having issues with now. Lights are fine one day and next there are sections that are missing a color and can’t display the proper selected color. See pictures. Will be reaching out for a replacement strip.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: WIFI Info
customer_reviews.text: If you simply just want a strip of lights, it's super easy. But if you are jumping from cabinets, a bit more difficult. There are kits out there that have connectors "strip to wire", but use the ones that actually puncture the strip. The one that just provide pressure did not work well at all. And for these lights, be sure you get the kit that is NOT for waterproof. Also, I had trouble connecting to the WiFi. Follow the connection instructions. When it was time to connect to the WiFi, I had to "forget" my network on my phone and then reconnect to it. This did the trick. Connecting to Alexa was easy!
customer_reviews.author: Mike G.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't match other brands of smart RGB lights
customer_reviews.text: I have a smart home with many different smart lights in it. I have brands such as Philips Hue, LifeX and a few lesser known brands such as this Govee strip. I connect them all to my google hub and am able to say "Hey Google, Turn lights soft white". The problem I have with this strip is that other than (Red, blue and green), this strip doesn't match any of my other bulbs. In the picture, you can see that I told google to turn lights "Incandescent" and the govee strip is almost blue.... This is definitely disappointing as even cheaper smart lights are able to match the colors of more well known brands such as Philips Hue.
customer_reviews.author: Weezzer

customer_reviews.title: Nice lights.
customer_reviews.text: These work great for lighting our gaming table. Perfect length, the colors are vibrant, and the pre-set "scenes" are nice. (I love the candlelight one.) The only thing preventing it from a perfect 5 stars is that while it says "wifi", you get the most functionality when you are connected to them through bluetooth, and therefor only allows for full control from one device. For the most part, that's not an issue. It was just something we discovered. I didn't have any trouble configuring the app to work with Google Home on my phone, but another family member did have some trouble on theirs. Despite that, we would probably buy these again if we need to. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: The whites are full range warm and cool.  I like having that choice.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t bother writing a review unless I’m impressed. I’m impressed. Lightweight. I like that. They’ll stay in place better than some older heavier brands names. Comes with little anchoring tabs, for a solid contact. I had no issue with setup. I followed the instructions exactly. Will purchase more from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: We got these for some under and over cabinet lighting in our kitchen. I really like it for ambiance lighting. However, it's not really bright enough for the under cabinet lighting to help while cooking. But I do like how they integrate with Google Home so I can turn them off/on with my voice. They do have good color variations, which is great. The default white is pretty blue-ish so I opt for soft-white and it's a bit better but not as bright. Eventually I will replace them for under cabinet lights, but these are a great deal for ambiance lighting for top cabinets or other things like that.
customer_reviews.author: Lance K.

customer_reviews.title: Sticks well... just follow directions
customer_reviews.text: I am in the process of revamping my bedroom, and I wanted these lights to provide a cool environment. The directions to set up the products was simple. I made sure that I clean all the surfaces off with alcohol. Went over it twice so all the oils and grime was removed. Waited an hour or so to make sure it was dry, and then proceeded to place the product. It was so east and the adhesive is strong. To get it set up in my Alexa, I had to go to the app and find the product name under "games". I am presently enjoying this product... It gives my room a really nice atmosphere.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great but we had 3 bad cells this time
customer_reviews.text: Ordered our third strip of these lights bc we love them. However, with the latest strip we bought, we had a cells in 3 of the LED lights stop working properly (see pictures attached). This happened within less than a month of purchase. Bummed about that, but overall we love the lights and having it connected to our Google home is awesome. The ability to change colors and brightness allows for really nice control.
customer_reviews.author: #StoutHouse

customer_reviews.title: Came in 2 strips that cannot be connected together
customer_reviews.text: Bought the 32' strip. Description says it comes in 2 rolls, but it say there is a connector, except there is not way to connect the 2 strips to each other. The only way is to connect each strip to the power supply, but then you have to plug the power supply in the middle, which really does not work for our purpose. The pictures also showed color changing colors throughout the strips, but the box says RGB and based on other reviews, the color changing feature along the strip is only a DreamColor feature which comes at a higher price point. Very disappointed overall with the listing. Returning now.
customer_reviews.author: gary robinson

customer_reviews.title: Dont Buy Trust Me!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these and before setting up just turned them on to make sure they worked, i was so disappointed, first they got super warm so i fear of fire hazard, secondly the white is more blue the color options are so limited the app shows so many variations but the lights didnt change nor did the brightness change, they dont get bright, i could have gotten a bad string im going to contact customer support if it’s unresolved im honestly going to return and just buy the phillips hue
customer_reviews.author: walter thorpe

customer_reviews.title: Grest quality, but came up short
customer_reviews.text: I bought these lights for my living room and I instantly loved them! Everything was great, and the brightness is awesome. I’ve connected it to my Alexa and I’m still learning the new commands for it. Sadly you can’t say, “set the mood to___.” It didn’t come with extra pieces to connect two strips which was the only downfall so now I have to order extra parts off Walmart. Out of alll the LEDs I’ve seen in person or purchased myself, these are by far worth the steep price. It stuck really well to my walls. Do not go cheap on strips I beg you. Don’t make that mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissie

customer_reviews.title: Not true white
customer_reviews.text: If you are picky about your white spectrum, look elsewhere. These LEDs achieve warm white by adding green hue, and cool by adding blue hue. I should have know that I would not get full spectrum RGB+White in a budget brand. For that, I have yet to find an alternative to Hur and LIFX. I am most irritated mainly because this brand advertises white as a feature. I expected better. Now I have to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Works Great At 1/3 The Price of Philips Hue!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply, excellent 3M adhesive with useful extra clips. More than double the length of the Philips Hue Starter kit at about 1/3 the price and requires no hub. Had to try three times to get it to link to network, but has been a solid connection since at more than 40' from my router. The Govee AOS ap is fine, but I am fully controlling the strip using the Alexa ap with no problems. This strip is BRIGHT! The maximum setting I am using is 10% and I drop it to less than 5% at night (actually set it to 1% but I am not sure that anything less than 5% works). Overall - perfectly satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Youngstrom

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Omg my 14 year loves it!!! I have to say it looks pretty cool He installed it himself to his bed, under and around so you cannot see the strips just the light illuminating it It’s totally cool So I bough a it hurst for my 11 year old and the 14 year installed it for him as well around his bed I’m thinking of getting multiple sets for the exterior of the house to use as Christmas lights I highly recommend these lights My tenant bought them for his back yard that’s how I found them and they look amazing
customer_reviews.author: Niki Wior

customer_reviews.title: Colors are not accurate
customer_reviews.text: It does not have a full spectrum of colors Alexa can respond to! The picture attached is supposed to be orange and is more of a yellow / green. I ask for pink and it looks white. Now you can go into the app and get orange through the color wheel but Alexa doesn’t pull orange. I haven’t explored Alexa and the scenes yet.. It was easy to install and I honestly should have checked all the colors before I stuck them to the wall. They were easy to sync with Alexa but you also need to download the Govee app. Syncs to music pretty fine as well .
customer_reviews.author: Ashley KOOP

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen lights
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights, however i have yet been able to instal to my Alexa, it just wont connect. the remote from my phone is awesome. does take a sec to connect at first then after it changes pretty quickly i did set up lights on a timer and they work perfect on the timer. the adhesive was pretty good but it does get loose. the box came with add on adhesive stickers that you can even screw on. I just used the sticker and it hasnt fallen yet. I plan to buy more for around the house but it lights the kitchen great and it looks so modern with just the touch of colorful lights.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality kit from a very high quality company.
customer_reviews.text: The LED kit is BRIGHT which I like a lot, with software updates still coming in to change the provided scenes which change up the lighting, I am never bored with this kit. Unfortunately some of the LED's burned out on the kit, I contacted support and was offered to be sent a new one! A totally unexpected response! I really appreciate high-quality customer support, and this company provides 100% SIDE NOTE the controller module is AMAZING. It provides me with every function that I want in a remote and nothing more. It has 3 buttons which makes it easy for anyone to understand. Even my 70 year old grandmother!
customer_reviews.author: Korban Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Works fantastic, great integration with Alexa
customer_reviews.text: I had a different product (LED lights) that I had under the top of a bunkbed for the kids. It had a remote, and the kids lost the remote making it unusable. I bought this as it has a 'fixed' switch remote, and also the Alexa integration. I had a minor install issue and the company immediately stepped in and resolved it, great customer support. These are plenty bright, but also will dim down to 1% level. "Alexa, make the light blue and 30%" changes the light within seconds. The colors are accurate, and bottom line is the kids love it. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: wilked

customer_reviews.title: Hard pass
customer_reviews.text: They were a Christmas gift and they didn’t get hung til mid January. At first they were cool there’s all these different colors and settings. Bu I noticed a couple weeks ago that they were strobing like crazy and I asked my daughter why she had the setting like that and she told me she didn’t that they have a mind of there own. They turn on by themselves they cycle through all differ t settings on their own. We turn them off and at 2 am they will just pop on and it looks like a damn disco in her room. The only thing to do is unplug them. I cannot recommend these lights
customer_reviews.author: Larlar818

customer_reviews.title: They work great
customer_reviews.text: Got these today and installed these today. I read a lot of reviews saying they don’t stick but I will say I had no problem with that. Clean the wall with alcohol pads and peeled and pressed pulling the paper off as I went. Easy process and they work great. My only problem was connecting to WiFi. I gave up that step might try again another day but after 20 tries I’m not in the mood anymore. But my 17 year old loves them. I bought the 16.4 ft which did half of her room which is enough for her. It was enough to go from the door over her bed and one wall.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something to accent behind my tv and cabinet that float in a corner. The adhesion was great and smooth. I followed the instructions and cleaned the adhesion points with alcohol. My only complaint is that they only included 5 stickies to run the strips through. The color choices are really beautiful and the app connects effortlessly. I some bad reviews from last year, but I haven't experienced any of those issues. With the humidity I'll know soon enough if the adhesive is going to give out. Staying optimistic!
customer_reviews.author: JoshuaNYC78

customer_reviews.title: a standalone smart LED light strip without HUB
customer_reviews.text: I like this stand alone wifi smart color led light strip. It is not only expensive but cumbersome for having an additional hub for smart LED light such as Philip hue. This smart device can let you voice/APP control. Pro: wifi, bluetooth control/App control withOUT hub, can change color, voice control turn on/off have different themes available on app. Con: you can NOT change the theme with google voice. If this is smart enough to change between different themes. It will be a 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great and Really Easy to Install....
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights! I am on my 5th set. The App is good on my I-Phone but not so good on the I-Pad like other people have mentioned. Just ordered another to try lighting my Sofa Base. I thought it would be cool to have the Sofa match the Projector Screen. I would say if you are on the fence about buying this product, give it a try. You will not regret it... FYI. Since the Projector Screen is so large (10ft Wide - 5ft Tall) I had to go with the 32ft (2 Strips) Version.
customer_reviews.author: David C

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY if you are wanting / needing it to work with ALEXA
customer_reviews.text: This device, and their other versions of 'Alexa compatible' devices, DO NOT stay connected to WiFi. They actually are great lights, but if you are required to use the app most of the time because Alexa will say 'please check the network connection and power supply' than these do not live up to their advertised 'works with Alexa'. Their customer support is terrible. All they are capable of offering for 'support' is 'please delete the device from the app, reset it, and try again'. Nope, didn't help. I also set up an entirely separate WiFi router JUST for the Govee devices. Nope, didn't help. Set static IP address for the devices. Nope, didn't help.
customer_reviews.author: Chad L. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed sets
customer_reviews.text: SO maybe i was super unlucky but one set out of 4 worked. The one set super bright, the remaining 3 sets are so dimmed it's so disappointing to my daughter who had received these as a Christmas gift. I had to pay for 4 sets to cover the lining of her room. My other complaint is that they don't come with connectors and you have to buy them desperately. For the price of the product of these Led lights should include them in packaging and they don't! So I spent all that money and time putting them up for only ONE set to work properly and out more money to purchase connectors.
customer_reviews.author: MaDsMoM84

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay.
customer_reviews.text: The main reason I got this was for the music feature which doesn’t work or if it does works like garbage. The lights are bright and easy to instal/set up though. Apps easy to use but the lights just don’t dance to the music like advertised. See video
customer_reviews.author: Adamwilson301

customer_reviews.title: Decent but no HomeKit
customer_reviews.text: The actual strips are pretty nice, I wish it didnt require such a huge box for power, its hard to hide for most of the places i'm using these strips. I have about 8 of these strips, and the biggest problem is lack of HomeKit. So I have to buy a wemo outlet for each one to plug these into so I can use siri to control them turning on/off with my HomeKit scenes. If they integrate HomeKit directly into them instead of lame alexa i'd buy a ton more and enthusiastically give these 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Von Pelt

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the bedroom.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to add some life to the bedroom at night. It was fairly easy to install and was complete within 15 minutes. At first the plan was to bring more color to our night life and add effect to our music while cleaning or lounging. Really simple to sync it to Alexa and the instructions were short and simple. The lights have made life much more lively in the bedroom. Speaking of which, last week our toddler discovered the sound reactive mode where the lights change color in response to sound and she now hosts Baby Shark raves in our room at least 3 times a day. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: alexdavis97

customer_reviews.title: Great lights, smart interface? Not so much.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Seller made right by me. Actually, very generously refunded my purchase, which is v nice considering it was a rather minor complaint imo. Well. These are lights. The app is good. The lights are great. But using with Google or Alexa? Needs a lot of work. You can basically only turn them on or off, adjust the brightness and change to a color. You cannot set a scene, or tell it to switch to one of the do it yourself modes. I was pretty disappointed that I can't tell it to do what I want and have to manually user the app every time. I know, I know. First world problems.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Martin

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with this LED strip!
customer_reviews.text: This LED strip works exactly as described. I had no issues with the app and connecting to Alexa was simple. I had to remove two of the sections after I incorrectly placed them and have had no problems with the adhesive sticking. I wiped everything down with a heavy dose of 91% Isopropyl alcohol before applying the strips. I have this backlighting a little bar. It's currently set at 1% and it's pretty bright. When I walk in the door I say "Alexa, I'm home", and she turns on the lights.
customer_reviews.author: mangellotti

customer_reviews.title: Govee reacting to my favorite song
customer_reviews.text: Govee is the company that brought my faith back in Chinese products. Awesome LED strips! Reacting to music is very responsive and one of better ones I have ever seen. I have purchased 5 strips so far and installed throughout my house. I am planning to purchase more to complete my project.
customer_reviews.author: John T.H. Ghim

customer_reviews.title: Second time is the charm
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED Review: After posting pictures with LEDs that didn't have a functioning blue channel, I contacted the seller and they sent a replacement immediately. The second roll of LED tape worked well even after being cut to length this time. I'm also pleased to report that I was able to solder the connector clip and salvage the functioning part of the old roll for reuse. Overall, very pleased with the experience with the seller. The product is great with the apps and Alexa voice controls so far, and the product is a good value for the cost. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Wetzel

customer_reviews.title: Poor Customer Service, doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: First, the package came in it’s original box which was damaged. Secondly, after attaching it around my room and excited to get it working - it does not turn on. Third, emailing their customer service for a refund back and forth for 2-weeks and STILL refused to mail me a prepaid label. I’m not going to paid for shipping and go out of my way during covid19 to return a product that looks cheap and doesn’t work. Still no real customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great LED light strip for use with smart assistant
customer_reviews.text: These look fantastic! I bought these as a kitchen cabinet underlight and they are very bright when at 100% brightness. They also make for excellent night lighting when set to 25% or below. Colors are fairly accurate, however some of the white tones are not 100% accurate. These do work with Google Assistant and were very easy to connect and control through various smart devices in my home. I definitely recommend for the person looking to get a nice light strip that is controllable through a smart assistant.
customer_reviews.author: A Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as the Philips Hue but a way affordable price.
customer_reviews.text: I set these up to illuminate the staircase leading into my apartment since there is no light fixture between the stairs and entrance door. Through a simple routine created with the Alexa app and the use of a Philips Hue motion sensor. I am able to set them to turn on when motion is sensed and off after a minute of no motion. The voice commands through Alexa works quite well. For $25 compared to $159 for the Philips Hue strips for the same length, I highly recommended the Govee strips.
customer_reviews.author: J Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Anyone can do it, super simple and HUGE difference
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly what I wanted and very easy to set up. I plugged it in and downloaded the app. There’s several settings you can change it to as well as custom “moods” you can set. It was all super simple. I put the lights over the top of my cabinets and they stuck well, just make sure you dust/clean the top per the instructions for the best result. Once paired with my Alexa I gotta say it really knocked me out of the park. This is a cheap project you can add to any home that will make a HUGE difference in any room. Very happy with my purchase and I plan on getting more for other rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: Love These
customer_reviews.text: We stuck these to the bed frame of my son's twin bed so they shine down on the floor essentially backlighting his bed and creating a soft glow in the room. Had no trouble connecting them to his echo dot and he likes to have them on while he falls asleep. I think it's fun to put them on the "dance to the music beat" mode so they flicker with the beat of whatever music is playing in the room. They can be hundreds of different colors and the app is easy to use on iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: R. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Entertaining for ANY/ALL age ranges!
customer_reviews.text: My 17 year old bought for her room. I must admit I go in there just for the light show at times (LOL). Its not just for one age group. *My 17 yr old for her room *I find myself going in just to enjoy * My 8 month old grandson ( my daughters nephew). My grandson LOVES to go in & watch the light show. He is so engaged & entertained by the different lights & different sequences. Not even realizing when I go in there to look at the lights. It is very relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant colors
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Super bright and just perfect. You can download the Govee app and register! So easy and simple to use once you set up thru WIFI or Bluetooth. You can do just about anything. You can choose any color you’d like. My favorite setting is when it flashes when sound is on. I watched a scary movie and the flashing of the lights when the scary parts came on makes it worth it. Add special effects
customer_reviews.author: Teri B

customer_reviews.title: Music setting for the lights are horrible!
customer_reviews.text: Lights are great, alexa voice control is great, and the app that's used to control the lights are great. The main issue is the sound detection in music mode is pure trash. The house will be quiet with no sound whatsoever and these will flicker like its having a seizure. When there is sound it don't pick up the beat half the time. I have the automotive version of these lights from the same company and they work like a champ in the car. Why doesn't these work like them?
customer_reviews.author: Ronald

customer_reviews.title: Poor app experience and connectivity
customer_reviews.text: It’s all about the app, and this product has a terrible one. It requires Bluetooth connection to set up the WiFi, which is fine, but the Bluetooth connection drops over and over again even when my phone is in he’s from the device. Once I got it connected and added WiFi, then it kept dropping the Bluetooth connection. After an hour is setup, I can’t get this thing to work correctly. I can also see from the UI of the app that it’s not likely to be intuitive to use if I can get it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Harich

customer_reviews.title: Great lights, EXCELLENT customer service
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has these up where the wall meets the Ceiling... works perfectly with her Alexa and she can change colors by telling Alexa too. After about a month a few of the bulbs went out and then a few more. I contacted the company and they had AMAZING customer service and replaced the string for us. She loves her lights and uses them everyday so I was VERY happy they were such a good company to purchase from. I bought a 2nd string knowing that if I have a problem, they’ll work with me. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Dolly Mama of 3

customer_reviews.title: The price RGB light strips should be
customer_reviews.text: I've bought several strips of these Govee lights (see video). The integration with Alexa is super easy, the application process is fast, and the customer support is great. The strip on the back of my TV had a few LEDs stop displaying the right colors, I contact Govee support through the app and they had a replacement strip sent to me the following week. Overall I'm pleased with the strips and I hope they last for several years.
customer_reviews.author: JustMaier

customer_reviews.title: Great LED strip. Could use a better remote
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Adheres amazingly LEDs seem to be very high quality Lighting is crisp and looks great Can customize the effects and colors using the app The app is pretty user-friendly and has good features Was long enough to wrap around the entire outer edge of our 75” TV Can have the light on even if the TV isn’t (because it uses a direct wall plug, rather than a USB to the TV Cons: The “remote” is very unintuitive and is wired directly into the power cord You have to use the app in order to customize any settings/effects or change to custom colors Overall it is a great product that could use a few tweaks to make it amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Smart and inexpensive option for desk lighting.
customer_reviews.text: By now you’ve seen the reviews. It’s a fantastic kit and works great with Alexa right out of the box. I’d really like to see this light be a bit brighter though. I bought two of these units, I used them both on identical desks. The first one was in a basement and felt like it was lacking in overall brightness. So much so that I hesitated installing the next one. The second unit seemed brighter overall but was near a window. Overall I’m happy with the product and installation. I ended up using the supplied hanging hardware for the power cord.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Some Lights Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: Big disappointment..after 2 months some of the lights stopped working..did I mention I wasn’t home for a month so I only got a full month out of them.. DO NOT BUY..provided a picture and that was only 1 spot..again BIG DISAPPOINTMENT *UPDATE* Very disappointed that now the entire thing doesn’t work anymore and NOBODY seems to give a S**T Changed my 2 star to 1 since there is no zero rating DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Not bright enough to work by.
customer_reviews.text: On full brightness they are not bright at all. I wanted to use these to illuminate my countertops for food prep. With white on full brightness they are simply not bright enough. Probably great for ambient but terrible for illuminating a workspace. No lumen rating.
customer_reviews.author: Teachy

customer_reviews.title: Good but not the best
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I really enjoy these lights. However, they seem to be having some trouble with connecting with Alexa and the colors are not very accurate. The orange is more of a yellow-green and the white is just a light blue or pale yellow, depending on whether you choose for it to be warm or cool toned. The variety colors is not what I expected it to be, but I don’t really have any complaints with that since the colors I wanted are the ones that work well. They stick onto the wall very well, my only complaints are with some colors and the bluetooth connection with Alexa.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Cool accent lights, but Miss-leading product picture
customer_reviews.text: The lights are cool and work well. installation was easy. Sticky Enough to stay on the underside of the counter for almost a year now with no issues. Google integration works well, and Timer feature is nice. The issue here is the product image shows multiple colors on a single strip, and this product cannot do that. Every LED on the strip is always the same color with this product. False advertising had me hoping for more.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Eeeh
customer_reviews.text: Did everything under the sun to get Alexa to control these lights to no avail. Keeps saying “ device is unresponsive “. I have a house filled with smart bulbs and switches so I think I know what I’m doing. Works fine with the govee app but that’s it. I finally plugged it into a wemo smart plug so at least I can turn them on and off but have to go to the app if I want to change colors etc. big disappointment, as I bought these because they were supported by Alexa.
customer_reviews.author: cejkwo

customer_reviews.title: Great Budget RGB Lights, but Music Mode is Worthless
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy everything about these lights, the setup was easy, pairing on the app was a breeze, although I would prefer you didn't have to make an account. The one problem I have is the music mode. I was expecting the lights to pulse or change color with the music, but they just flash randomly when in music mode, not to the beat or anything, just randomly. While that is quite the let down, if you want a good budget RGB light strip to add some cool atmosphere to a room, this product is a great choice, just don't expect anything from music mode
customer_reviews.author: Ryan T

customer_reviews.title: Disconnect from WiFi daily
customer_reviews.text: These were working for a couple months but now, I’m lucky to make it through 1 single day without these disconnecting from WiFi. I have three of these light strips, all have the same WiFi connection problem. The only devices that I have internet issues with. I’ve also had Govee light bulbs that had the same WiFi issues, I had to stop using those because of the WiFi issues. I prefer to just leave these turned off rather than fight with their network issues on a daily basis. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Dalton Bush

customer_reviews.title: Nice for under counter lighting
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice LED light strip! Easy to install. Looks great and the electrical connections are small and unobtrusive. The the ability to use the on/off switch or Alexa is a plus. It is easier then using a remote to turn on/off the lights that are used with most other products. It took me a few tries to get the lights to communicate with the APP. Kept getting "network anomaly" when trying to register. Maybe the Govee site was not available for a short time. However, since then, everything is working great!. As others have noted, the lights could be a little brighter, however, they are bright enough to light my counter top. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RobertO

customer_reviews.title: Great light with Alexa integration!
customer_reviews.text: This led light strip was exactly what I was looking for. It was long enough to go around all 4 edges of my 65 inch tv and have extra which I cut off. Powered it on and the setup with Alexa only took a few minutes. It's nice and bright and really made my setup pop. Highly recommend this light strip. Installation tip: Lay out the light strip ahead of time on the tv. Use scotch tape to tape it down at the corners and the middle of each of the 4 sections. This keeps the strip in place as you peel away the backing and helps keep a more even line.
customer_reviews.author: basscow

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase of LED lights so far
customer_reviews.text: These lights are awesome. I wanted some lights on my TV for when I game. They come with the controller but you can also download the app and control them from there. I have them linked with my Alexa so I ask her to turn them on and off but you can just go on the app and turn them on and off from there. Another thing I liked was the fact that you can create your own colors and combinations through the app. I could not figure out how to get them to work with the music but it is also an option.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Govee Smart WiFi LED Strip Lights Works with Alexa, Google Home Brighter 5050 LED, 16 Million Colors Phone App Controlled Music Light Strip for Home, Kitchen, TV, Party, for iOS and Android, 16.4ft
feature_bullets: Voice Control, Works with Alexa, Google Assistant: Govee strip lights can free your hands to control the light. Use simple conversation starters to turn your lights on and off, set color, make them brighter. It is currently compatible with Echo & Google Home. [NOT SUPPORT 5G WiFi]

WiFi and Bluetooth Control via App: The app “Govee Home” does what the lights can do (turn on / off, change color and brightness). They are fully RGB and via the phone app, you have all of the colors to select. You can DIY your favorite colors by mixing several colors and keep it for later use. Timer function allows you run your home light system in smart way.

Music LED Strip Lights: There is a built-in microphone that will sync with any music coming out of phone speaker or any other speaker in room and dance the lights along with beats of music (or hands claps). This function is available on App and controller, use it to make your environment alive!

Perfect Ambience Light: Our light strips are made of premium bright 5050 LED lights. It’s NOT waterproof and is designed for indoor uses. It can decorate your bedroom, ceiling, stairs, kitchen cabinet, porch, desk, and living room, especially great for holidays like Christmas, Halloween, Parties etc.

Easy to Install: Govee aims to provide a simple way to start designing your connected home. So, this is an ALL-IN-ONE kit comes with an ETL listed adapter, a WiFi controller, 16.4ft light strip; Genuine 3M adhesive and 5 fixing clips. Refer to the picture, video and user manual to install. Please be free to contact us for any product question and suggestion.(NOTE: Connectors NOT included, you will need to buy EXTRA 4-PIN CONNECTORS for reconnection)

specifications.Special Features: Works with Alexa, Dimmable, Smart Wi-Fi Remote Control, Govee Home APP Controlled, Voice Control, Works with Google Assistant
specifications.Included Components: 1 Roll of 16.4ft LED Strip Lights, 12V 1.5A Adapter, 1 Control Box, 5 Support Clips
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars10,539 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
